'''''Vinyar Tengwar 8''''' is the eighth issue of ''[[Vinyar Tengwar]]'', a journal dedicated to the scholarly study of the invented languages of  [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].
{{VTnav|7|9}}

==Contents==
* Cover: Full Chart of the ''Tengwar''✫ — Edouard Kloczko
* E.L.F. News
* Letters to ''VT''

* "Views on Elvish" — Edouard Kloczko
* "''Essitalmar'': Place-names of Beleriand" (column, with fold-out map) — Tom Loback
* "Transitions in Translations: The Portuguese Gnome" (column) — Arden R. Smith
* "The Rime of the Ancient Philologer" — Paul Nolan Hyde

<small>✫ contains formerly unpublished material</small>
